tool_description: Manages multi-channel distribution of RFP documents to qualified vendors through various communication methods.

vendor_list.description: List of qualified vendor contact information

error_messages: Invalid RFP document ID: Provide valid assembled document identifier.
Empty vendor list: At least one vendor contact must be specified.
Invalid distribution channels: Use email, portal, mail, or website.
Invalid distribution date: Provide valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Distribution scheduling conflict: Date conflicts with organizational schedule.
usage: Provide RFP document ID, vendor list, and preferred distribution channels with scheduled date. Optionally specify public posting requirements. The tool manages distribution and tracks delivery status.

distribution_id.description: Unique identifier for this distribution event

delivery_confirmations.description: Confirmation status for each vendor contact

distribution_summary.description: Summary of distribution results and any issues
